name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel: Dawn of the Battle Royale
storyline:
In the single-player story-based mode, you’ll be able to explore the vibrant world of Yu-Gi-Oh! SEVENS and meet its array of intriguing new characters. Duel them using powerful new monsters as seen in the show, all while collecting cards and getting ready to build your own Deck after completing the story.

But the action doesn’t end there! Take on your friends in thrilling two-player card battles using the Nintendo Switch’s local multiplayer capability. Or prove your Dueling abilities by going online and taking on challengers across the globe.
summary: In Yu-Gi-Oh! Rush Duel, the tide can turn at any moment as you and your opponent summon powerful monsters left and right and fill up your hands with countless draws. One minute you might be in total control, the next your opponent gains the momentum! Explore the world of the animated series Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens and take on characters from the show in swift and intense Duels. Win Duels, collect new cards and build up your Deck. Challenge your friends locally or go online and take on Duelists across the globe.
